outputs.output_descr:
This phase supports the design of the full-sized project Enhancing the Prevention, Control and Management of Invasive Alien Species in Vulnerable Ecosystems in Cuba.
Activity 1. Baseline data collection, information gap analysis necessary for elaborating the Invasive Alien Species control and management strategy.
Activity 2. Assessment of institutional, regulatory and legal framework for Invasive Alien Species control and management.
Activity 3. Enabling environment for a national Invasive Alien Species control and management plan.
Activity 4. Monitoring and evaluation strategy.

project_descr: Prevention, control and management of Invasive Alien Species in vulnerable in vulnerable ecosystems in Cuba.
project_title: Cuba: Control and Management of Invasive Alien Species
